current_task.title: Install matrix-js-sdk and create matrixClient.js
current_task.description:
Install matrix-js-sdk in the client package and create a singleton client module following the same pattern as socket.js.

The matrixClient.js should:
1. Export a singleton instance (lazy initialization)
2. Provide createClient(options) function that initializes the SDK client
3. Provide getClient() function to retrieve the current client
4. Provide destroyClient() function to cleanup and logout
5. Support configurable homeserver URL via VITE_MATRIX_HOMESERVER_URL env var
6. Default homeserver URL should be window.location.origin + '/_matrix'

For Vite compatibility, you may need to configure matrix-js-sdk properly. Check if any polyfills or Vite config changes are needed.

Follow the singleton pattern established in client/src/lib/socket.js for consistency.
acceptance_criteria: matrix-js-sdk is added to client/package.json dependencies
Reads homeserver URL from VITE_MATRIX_HOMESERVER_URL or defaults to origin/_matrix
VITE_MATRIX_HOMESERVER_URL added to client/.env.example (create if needed)
No TypeScript errors or build warnings from matrix-js-sdk import
